name: I am here for you
description:
I am here for you is a 2D adventure game developed in Unity3D for Windows by the 2Weeks team consisted of 3 friends (besties). This game was created for the "DeepWell DTX + Global Game Jam - May Day Mental Health Jam" and all assets were created by our team.

The theme of the jam is mental health.

Be part of Sam's journey to overcome fear, stress and anxiety...

Controls: 

WASD -> Move

E -> Skip Dialog

Esc -> Open menu

Alt + F4 -> Force Quit

And follow in-game instructions
